rule.name: cagrid-base-war.binaries.file-syntax
rule.description: Checks cagrid-base-war.binaries.file is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: cagrid-base-war.binaries.file did not pass validation. cagrid-base-war.binaries.file must be null or have a value and not contain spaces or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "cagrid-wscore-4.0.3-appserver-base-war.zip".

rule.name: cagrid-base-war.binaries.relative.dir-syntax
rule.description: Checks cagrid-base-war.binaries.relative.dir is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: cagrid-base-war.binaries.relative.dir did not pass validation. cagrid-base-war.binaries.relative.dir must be null or have a value and not contain spaces or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - ".".

rule.name: cagrid-base-war.src.url-syntax
rule.description: Checks cagrid-base-war.src.url is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: cagrid-base-war.src.url did not pass validation. cagrid-base-war.src.url must be null or have a value and not contain spaces or back slashes (\). Sample valid value - "http://gforge.nci.nih.gov/svnroot/commonlibrary/trunk/techstack-2007/os-independent/cagrid-wscore-4.0.3-appserver-base-war.zip".

rule.name: cagrid-base-war.src.url-url
rule.description: Checks cagrid-base-war.src.url has proper value.
rule.fail-message: cagrid-base-war.src.url did not pass validation. cagrid-base-war.src.url must be http(s)://*.nci.nih.gov/*. Sample valid value - "http://gforge.nci.nih.gov/svnroot/commonlibrary/trunk/techstack-2007/os-independent/cagrid-wscore-4.0.3-appserver-base-war.zip".

rule.name: grid.target-value
rule.description: Checks grid.target has proper value.
rule.fail-message: grid.target did not pass validation. Must be one of the following (nci_prod-1.3, nci_stage-1.3, nci_qa-1.3, training-1.3).
